:::: {.content-hidden unless-format="revealjs"}
{{< include /guide/model-validation/_validation-guidelines.qmd >}}

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa gear >}} Settings**.

2. Under Workspace, select **Risk Areas & Validation Guidelines**.

1. Hover over the risk area you want to add a guideline to until the **{{< fa ellipsis-vertical >}}** menu appears, then click on it.

1. Select **{{< fa plus >}} Add Guideline**.

1. Provide a **[title]{.smallcaps}** and **[description]{.smallcaps}** for your guideline.

1. Click **Add Guideline** to insert your guideline to that risk area.

    After you save, confirm that your guideline was added to your risk area in alphabetical order.
